Uses of Class
org.drip.math.spline.ElasticCoefficients

  • Packages that use ElasticCoefficients 
    Package Description
    org.drip.math.spline  

    • Uses of ElasticCoefficients in org.drip.math.spline

      Subclasses of ElasticCoefficients in org.drip.math.spline 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasisCubicPolynomial
      This class implements the elastic coefficients for the segment using cubic polynomial basis splines.
      class  BasisExponentialTension
      This class implements the elastic coefficients for the segment using tension exponential basis splines.
      class  BasisHyperbolicTension
      This class implements the elastic coefficients for the segment using tension hyperbolic basis splines.
      class  BasisPolynomial
      This class implements the elastic coefficients for the segment using the following polynomial basis spline: A + B*x where is the normalized ordinate mapped as x => (x - x_i-1) / (x_i - x_i-1)
      class  BasisQuarticPolynomial
      This class implements the elastic coefficients for the segment using quartic polynomial basis splines.
      Methods in org.drip.math.spline that return ElasticCoefficients 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ElasticCoefficients BasisSplineSegment.getElastics()
      Retrieve the segment elastics

      Calibrate the coefficients from the prior B Spline Segment and the right node value
